item.title: Adding shopping list items via Home Assistant voice commands
item.description:
I recently got access to a couple of Home Assistant Voice Previews, and wanted a way to quickly add items to my shopping list using voice commands. The built-in intents for adding todo list items are kind of wordy, and I liked how Alexa had a simple “Alexa add foo” shortcut to add items to a default shopping list.

After some tinkering, I came up with a simple setup that uses Home Assistantâ€™s conversation integration, intent_script, and a few custom sentences to streamline the process.

item.title: Holiday time - bulk declining Google Calendar events
item.description:
I’m getting married in a few weeks, so recently I wanted a way to decline about 3 weeks worth of Google Calendar events en-masse. Since I was using Google Apps for our organisation’s calendar, I found the easiest way to accomplish this was to bust out some Google Apps Scripting, which lets you script a number of Google Apps in your domain, including the Calendar.
